title: Wear App Uninstaller
summary: Simplest & fastest android wear app uninstaller tool for wear to uninstall apps.

descriptionHTML:
Wear Uninstaller App is an android wear app to uninstall apps from wear device. Effective in User Interface, look, feel and the unique features, this is the #1 app to Uninstall apps from wear in the market. Easy to use, simple and fast uninstaller tool to remove apps made for android wear.

Wear Uninstaller App promotes a hassle free wear experience with an array of attractive features that are unique to this app.

Unique Features Introduced By Wear Uninstaller:
Apart from the user-friendliness, attractive and minimalistic UIs and high-end performance, the component of the app led the team of developers to take uninstalling wear apps into a whole new level. Below are the key highlights implemented to the Wear Uninstaller App.

Android Wear Uninstaller has introduced a range of inimitable features such as:
• Show list of Installed Apps and System App
• Menu options - Details, Open and Uninstall
• You can view details of any installed or system app right on your wear and Open any app.
• Faster Uninstaller Option
• The first and best wear uninstaller app app for your android wear device
• Available for Android Wear 1.0 and latest version 2.0 watches
• For Android 2.0 wear devices, the Wear Uninstaller App can be downloaded from wear itself. It is supported by phone dependant app as well as the standalone app.
• Compatible with Round watch as well as Square watch design
• Supports on all Android Wear versions

!! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 NOR GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS or other OS)

What are you waiting for? Download the most advanced Easy Wear Uninstaller app of all times to remove unwanted apps and clean the space right from your wear for good!

** If you have any issues or questions, feel free to contact by email before giving a bad rating. Reviews and feature requests are most welcomed. Thanks.
comments: I don't know what to say, except this is great? I kinda assumed this was impossible, last time I tried to find an app for it they all said it couldn't be done without root. But it works exactly as advertised. I needed to uninstall a debug version of an app on my 1.0 watch and ABD wasn't working, so this is kinda a life saver. Perhaps add the uninstall option to the mobile version as well, but all in all, I'm very impressed.
recentChanges: App details dialog UI cutting issue fixed.
